Name: Schwerpunkt
About the game: Schwerpunkt is a World War 2 military simulation game. Fight through several scenarios, making daring manoeuvres in an attempt to outsmart your enemy. You will take control of a plethora of unique units, each of which will play a role in securing success. Use armoured units to smash through enemy lines while motorised infantry fills the gaps. Environments Your quest for victory will take you through a multitude of environments, from vast plains to boggy marshes. The terrain will affect the performance of your units, so plan your offensives accordingly. Units You control many unique units, each of which come in a variety of sizes. Units have strengths and weaknesses. For example, it would be unwise to send armour against an enemy anti-tank division. Map Editor If you complete all the scenarios or have an idea for a map, you can use the map editor to create new scenarios. Enjoy limitless access to all the terrain settings and unit types available.
